body_html: Until nccl subtree in pytorch is updated, you can't compile nccl from source, you should be installing precompiled nccl packages http://developer.download.nvidia.com/compute/machine-learning/repos/ubuntu1604/x86_64/. Don't know how it would work with arch linux, though.
